name: @edenapp/eden
description: A modular Electron desktop environment with extensible app support
author: Eden Team

scripts.build: pnpm run tokens:build && pnpm run css:build && pnpm run codegen && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run bundle:app-frame && pnpm run copy-assets && pnpm run build:apps
scripts.css:build: npx lightningcss --bundle --minify --targets 'chrome 132' src/design-system/eden.css -o dist/design-system/eden.css && npx lightningcss --bundle --minify --targets 'chrome 132' src/design-system/tokens.css -o dist/design-system/eden-tokens.css
scripts.tokens:build: cd src/design-system && npx style-dictionary build --config style-dictionary.config.mjs
scripts.tokens:watch: cd src/design-system && npx style-dictionary build --watch --config style-dictionary.config.mjs
scripts.dev: pnpm run build && concurrently --kill-others "pnpm run dev:watch" "sleep 3 && NODE_ENV=development electron ."
